name: Shelter (itch) (Soundole)
description:
A submission for the 'One Room' Bitsy Jam.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, swipe on mobile. Push into objects to interact with them.

Pets don't forget their families. They are a life-long commitment.

Please tell your friends to adopt from shelters (they contain absolutely all sorts of animals!) rather than supporting breeders or pet shops.

By Soundole (Peter Anthony Smith) with some design suggestions by bookwyrmle (Erin Harrison-Smith).
